reason.tex: %text \underline\text{By definition}, if $F(x)$ be the anti-derivative of a function $f(x)$, then \[ \qquad \ddx F(x) = f(x) \] Conversely \[ \qquad \int f(x)\cdot dx = F(x) \] %
